verses.verse: <S%H7586>Saul<s%> <S%H4427>reigned<s%> one <S%H8141>year;<s%> and when he had <S%H4427>reigned<s%> <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> <S%H5921>over<s%> <S%H3478>Israel,<s%>

<S%H7586>Saul<s%> <S%H977>chose<s%> him <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%> men of <S%H3478>Israel;<s%> whereof two <S%H505>thousand<s%> were with <S%H7586>Saul<s%> in <S%H4363>Michmash<s%> and in <S%H2022>mount<s%> <S%H1008>Bethel,<s%> and a <S%H505>thousand<s%> were with <S%H3129>Jonathan<s%> in <S%H1390>Gibeah<s%> of <S%H1144>Benjamin:<s%> and the <S%H3499>rest<s%> of the <S%H5971>people<s%> he <S%H7971>sent<s%> every <S%H376>man<s%> to his <S%H168>tent.<s%>

And <S%H3129>Jonathan<s%> <S%H5221>smote<s%> the <S%H5333>garrison<s%> of the <S%H6430>Philistines<s%> that was in <S%H1387>Geba,<s%> and the <S%H6430>Philistines<s%> <S%H8085>heard<s%> of it. And <S%H7586>Saul<s%> <S%H8628>blew<s%> the <S%H7782>trumpet<s%> throughout <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H776>land,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> Let the <S%H5680>Hebrews<s%> <S%H8085>hear.<s%>

And <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H8085>heard<s%> <S%H559>say<s%> that <S%H7586>Saul<s%> had <S%H5221>smitten<s%> a <S%H5333>garrison<s%> of the <S%H6430>Philistines,<s%> and that <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H1571>also<s%> was had in <S%H887>abomination<s%> with the <S%H6430>Philistines.<s%> And the <S%H5971>people<s%> were <S%H6817>called<s%> together <S%H310>after<s%> <S%H7586>Saul<s%> to <S%H1537>Gilgal.<s%>

And the <S%H6430>Philistines<s%> <S%H622>gathered<s%> themselves together to <S%H3898>fight<s%> with <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> <S%H7970>thirty<s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%> <S%H7393>chariots,<s%> and <S%H8337>six<s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%> <S%H6571>horsemen,<s%> and <S%H5971>people<s%> as the <S%H2344>sand<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> is <S%H5921>on<s%> the <S%H3220>sea<s%> <S%H8193>shore<s%> in <S%H7230>multitude:<s%> and they <S%H5927>came<s%> up, and <S%H2583>pitched<s%> in <S%H4363>Michmash,<s%> <S%H6926>eastward<s%> from <S%H1007>Bethaven.<s%>

When the <S%H376>men<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H7200>saw<s%> that they were in a <S%H6887>strait,<s%> (for the <S%H5971>people<s%> were <S%H5065>distressed,<s%>) then the <S%H5971>people<s%> did <S%H2244>hide<s%> themselves in <S%H4631>caves,<s%> and in <S%H2337>thickets,<s%> and in <S%H5553>rocks,<s%> and in <S%H6877>high<s%> places, and in <S%H953>pits.<s%>

And some of the <S%H5680>Hebrews<s%> <S%H5674>went<s%> <S%H5674>over<s%> <S%H3383>Jordan<s%> to the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H1410>Gad<s%> and <S%H1568>Gilead.<s%> As for <S%H7586>Saul,<s%> he was <S%H5750>yet<s%> in <S%H1537>Gilgal,<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H310>followed<s%> him <S%H2729>trembling.<s%>

And he <S%H3176>tarried<s%> <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H3117>days,<s%> according to the <S%H4150>set<s%> time that <S%H8050>Samuel<s%> had appointed: but <S%H8050>Samuel<s%> <S%H935>came<s%> not to <S%H1537>Gilgal;<s%> and the <S%H5971>people<s%> were <S%H6327>scattered<s%> from him.

And <S%H7586>Saul<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H5066>Bring<s%> <S%H5066>here<s%> a <S%H5930>burnt<s%> offering to me, and <S%H8002>peace<s%> offerings. And he <S%H5927>offered<s%> the <S%H5930>burnt<s%> offering.

And it <S%H1961>came<s%> to pass, that as soon as he had made an <S%H3615>end<s%> of <S%H5927>offering<s%> the <S%H5930>burnt<s%> offering, <S%H2009>behold,<s%> <S%H8050>Samuel<s%> <S%H935>came;<s%> and <S%H7586>Saul<s%> <S%H3318>went<s%> out to <S%H7125>meet<s%> him, that he might <S%H1288>salute<s%> him.

And <S%H8050>Samuel<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H4100>What<s%> have you <S%H6213>done?<s%> And <S%H7586>Saul<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H3588>Because<s%> I <S%H7200>saw<s%> that the <S%H5971>people<s%> were <S%H5310>scattered<s%> from me, and that you <S%H935>came<s%> not within the <S%H3117>days<s%> <S%H4150>appointed,<s%> and that the <S%H6430>Philistines<s%> <S%H622>gathered<s%> themselves together at <S%H4363>Michmash;<s%>

Therefore <S%H559>said<s%> I, The <S%H6430>Philistines<s%> will <S%H3381>come<s%> <S%H3381>down<s%> <S%H6258>now<s%> on me to <S%H1537>Gilgal,<s%> and I have not made <S%H2470>supplication<s%> to the <S%H3068>LORD:<s%> I <S%H662>forced<s%> myself therefore, and <S%H5927>offered<s%> a <S%H5930>burnt<s%> offering.

And <S%H8050>Samuel<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H7586>Saul,<s%> You have done <S%H5528>foolishly:<s%> you have not <S%H8104>kept<s%> the <S%H4687>commandment<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> your <S%H430>God,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> he <S%H6680>commanded<s%> you: for <S%H6258>now<s%> would the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> have <S%H3559>established<s%> your <S%H4467>kingdom<s%> on <S%H3478>Israel<s%> for <S%H5769>ever.<s%>

But <S%H6258>now<s%> your <S%H4467>kingdom<s%> shall not <S%H6965>continue:<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> has <S%H1245>sought<s%> him a <S%H376>man<s%> after his own <S%H3824>heart,<s%> and the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> has <S%H6680>commanded<s%> him to be <S%H5057>captain<s%> <S%H5921>over<s%> his <S%H5971>people,<s%> <S%H3588>because<s%> you have not <S%H8104>kept<s%> that <S%H834>which<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H6680>commanded<s%> you.

And <S%H8050>Samuel<s%> <S%H6965>arose,<s%> and <S%H5927>got<s%> him up from <S%H1537>Gilgal<s%> to <S%H1390>Gibeah<s%> of <S%H1144>Benjamin.<s%> And <S%H7586>Saul<s%> <S%H6485>numbered<s%> the <S%H5971>people<s%> that were <S%H4672>present<s%> with him, about <S%H8337>six<s%> <S%H3967>hundred<s%> <S%H376>men.<s%>

And <S%H7586>Saul,<s%> and <S%H3129>Jonathan<s%> his <S%H1121>son,<s%> and the <S%H5971>people<s%> that were <S%H4672>present<s%> with them, <S%H3427>stayed<s%> in <S%H1390>Gibeah<s%> of <S%H1144>Benjamin:<s%> but the <S%H6430>Philistines<s%> <S%H2583>encamped<s%> in <S%H4363>Michmash.<s%>

And the <S%H7843>spoilers<s%> <S%H3318>came<s%> out of the <S%H4264>camp<s%> of the <S%H6430>Philistines<s%> in <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H7218>companies:<s%> <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H7218>company<s%> <S%H6437>turned<s%> to the <S%H1870>way<s%> that leads to <S%H6084>Ophrah,<s%> to the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H7777>Shual:<s%>

And <S%H259>another<s%> <S%H7218>company<s%> <S%H6437>turned<s%> the <S%H1870>way<s%> to <S%H1032>Bethhoron:<s%> and <S%H259>another<s%> <S%H7218>company<s%> <S%H6437>turned<s%> to the <S%H1870>way<s%> of the <S%H1366>border<s%> that <S%H8259>looks<s%> to the <S%H1516>valley<s%> of <S%H6650>Zeboim<s%> toward the <S%H4057>wilderness.<s%>

Now there was <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H2796>smith<s%> <S%H4672>found<s%> throughout <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel:<s%> for the <S%H6430>Philistines<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H6435>Lest<s%> the <S%H5680>Hebrews<s%> <S%H6213>make<s%> them <S%H2719>swords<s%> <S%H176>or<s%> <S%H2595>spears:<s%>

But <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H3478>Israelites<s%> <S%H3381>went<s%> <S%H3381>down<s%> to the <S%H6430>Philistines,<s%> to <S%H3913>sharpen<s%> every <S%H376>man<s%> his <S%H4282>share,<s%> and his <S%H855>coulter,<s%> and his <S%H7134>ax,<s%> and his <S%H4281>mattock.<s%>

Yet they had a <S%H6477>file<s%> <S%H6310><s%> for the <S%H4281>mattocks,<s%> and for the <S%H855>coulters,<s%> and for the <S%H7969>forks,<s%> <S%H7053><s%> and for the <S%H7134>axes,<s%> and to <S%H5324>sharpen<s%> the <S%H1861>goads.<s%>

So it <S%H1961>came<s%> to pass in the <S%H3117>day<s%> of <S%H4421>battle,<s%> that there was <S%H3808>neither<s%> <S%H2719>sword<s%> nor <S%H2595>spear<s%> <S%H4672>found<s%> in the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of <S%H3605>any<s%> of the <S%H5971>people<s%> that were with <S%H7586>Saul<s%> and <S%H3129>Jonathan:<s%> but with <S%H7586>Saul<s%> and with <S%H3129>Jonathan<s%> his <S%H1121>son<s%> was there <S%H4672>found.<s%>
And the <S%H4673>garrison<s%> of the <S%H6430>Philistines<s%> <S%H3318>went<s%> out to the <S%H4569>passage<s%> of <S%H4363>Michmash.<s%>
